name: Mer-Maid Manor
description:
Made for A Game By Its Cover 2015

Inspired by Zac Gorman's Mer-Maid Manor

A small arcade game where you need to clean a dirty manor. Fling soap from your mops to to pre-clean surfaces so you can slide across faster!

Avoid getting caught by anemones!

You can trap squids and pop them with your soap!

Avoid sharks at all cost!

Controls

Player 1

Movement: W,A,S,D

Soap: F

Player 2

Movement: Arrow keys

Soap: L

It was designed as a sort of combination of Dustforce and Bubble Bobble but underwater.

Currently has no music because I'm bad at making music and not content with anything made so far.
